name: Cara-Carry Me Away
description: Cara cara oranges are sweet and low in acid with hints of grapefruit and cherry. They add depth to this citrusy, refreshing tequila cocktail.
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces freshly squeezed cara cara juice

recipeInstructions.text: Combine tequila, cara cara juice, grapefruit juice, lime juice, and agave syrup in a cocktail shaker.
Fill shaker with ice. Shake vigorously for 30 seconds. Strain into a tequila glass or champagne flute and top with soda. Garnish with cara cara orange peel twist.
